text:
*Is someone know how to trigger a print and a click ?*
Use case = I have a dynamic banner just for specific leads. I would like to trigger when this banner appear and when the user clicks !

I believe that Click can be triggered with Event but I don’t know how to trigger SHOW ?

Thanks a lot !
you may want to post this in the <#CBA9UA4EN|javascript> channel
i swear i had this working at one point - trying to reference a value set in a custom module from another custom module inside the same email template.
however that module ID changes, so
This is something I'm interested in doing, but there are other priorities at the moment. I just have to get my plan figured out and then figure out where this coding stuff fits in.
